response.overview: An ex-mercenary turned smuggler. A Mende fisherman. Amid the explosive civil war overtaking 1999 Sierra Leone, these men join for two desperate missions: recovering a rare pink diamond of immense value and rescuing the fisherman's son, conscripted as a child soldier into the brutal rebel forces ripping a swath of torture and bloodshed countrywide.

production_companies.name: Lonely Film Productions GmbH & Co. KG.

response.title: Blood Diamond

titles.title: ブラッド・ダイヤモンド
